description:
The latest fwupd 1.9.24 firmware update daemon rolls out enhanced Dell support, Redfish BMC fixes, and better ESP management.

The post Fwupd 1.9.24 Enhanced Support for Dell Devices appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Fwupd 1.9.24 Enhanced Support for Dell Devices

description:
There’s been a lot of changes added since the alpha version of the GNOME 47 desktop series, and the beta release is packed with lots of goodies, including support for hardware encoding for screen recordings, support for tablet tool keybindings and actions, support for tablet tool pressure ranges, and implementation of placement and focus logic […]

The post GNOME 47 Beta Desktop Released With Many Changes, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: GNOME 47 Beta Desktop Released With Many Changes, Here’s What’s New

description:
LibreOffice 24.8 is out, featuring advanced privacy settings, a wealth of new features across all apps, and broad OS compatibility. Learn more!

The post LibreOffice 24.8 Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: LibreOffice 24.8 Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
Firejail allows you to easily sandbox Linux applications. Find out how to add this extra layer of security.

The post How to Install and Use Firejail on Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install and Use Firejail on Linux

description:
A security researcher has uncovered a critical vulnerability in the LiteSpeed Cache plugin. Patchstack has awarded a $14,400 bounty for the discovery.

The post Record-Breaking Bounty Awarded For LiteSpeed Cache Plugin Vulnerability appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Record-Breaking Bounty Awarded For LiteSpeed Cache Plugin Vulnerability

description:
In this tutorial, we will show you how to install Visual Studio Code on Fedora 40. Visual Studio Code, often abbreviated as VS Code, is a powerful and versatile code editor developed by Microsoft. Despite its name, it’s not just limited to Visual Studio or Microsoft technologies. VS Code has gained immense popularity among developers […]

The post How to Install Visual Studio Code on Fedora 40 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Visual Studio Code on Fedora 40

description:
